extendedInfo.description: Can you go from rat to dope drug wars king pin? Do it with Drug Wars!Start off as a street rat with a some pocket cash and a debt to a loan shark. Make money by dealing dope, drugs or banking to pay the loan shark off. Prices for drugs and dope change at each location, and you'll need to move around to find where to buy and sell, but be careful! The cops are always watching out for dope people transporting drugs, so be ready to run, or buy guns and try to fight your way out!Drug Wars is based on the classic game "DrugWars" (Drug Wars) by John Dell, brought to mobile with an updated graphical style! Make sure to try out Drug Wars today!If you're a fan of Dope Wars, Drug Trader, Dope Traffic, Drug Runner, or any of those sorts of games, then you'll definitely want to check this one out.  Drug Wars has some of the best graphics and game play of them all.  Don't settle for second best, get Drug Wars today! We've got wars, we've got dope, and we've got drugs, what more could you possibly be looking for in a game.There is a HOSPITAL, GUNS, COPS, BUSTS, and other great features to keep you coming back for more.  The game also includes dope global leaderboards and achievements!

reviews.title: Made phone crash/freeze
reviews.comment: If you have a galaxy s3 don\'t get this app! It froze my phone and I had to take the battery out. I wish I could give this app 0 stars
reviews.author: Josh Griep

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work more than once
reviews.comment: It tries to force you to login to a social media account. Then once you hit what game you want to play it freezes. Go back to home screen and back in and its working. Then once you die you are stuck in the game. You can continue to do thing but each time you buy or sell more stuff and then leave for a new area it again says You\'re Dead. Had to force close it and it does the same things over and over. Poorly made game.
reviews.author: Jason Lowery

reviews.title: Bad money cap.
reviews.comment: The money cap that makes you loose access to your money needs to go.
reviews.author: tan ban

reviews.title: Froze my phone
reviews.comment: Just like the title says. Had to do a hard reboot because of this piece of trash game.
reviews.author: Anthony Jackson

reviews.title: Was decent but there\'s a money cap...
reviews.comment: I\'ve done the unlimited game twice, and each time I get over 2 billion in the bank, I lose access to my money. Why?  Fix cap and I\'ll \'re-rate to 5 stars.
reviews.author: Shane Eppley

reviews.title: Games ok but
reviews.comment: Games is ok to play but tap joy offers dont pay u tell them ur missing coins u get a email to screen shop the offer app on phone then u wait and get no reply and no coins im uninstalling and this game is staying 1 star untill unlimited is free
